text_alert_logout: Are you sure you want to log out?

text_alert_reset: Are you sure you want to reset password?
text_alert_delete_pbl: Are you sure you want to delete?
text_alert_failed: Something wrong, Please try again at a moment
text_alert_warning_group_1: Number of Members cannot be greater than Number of Participants
text_alert_warning_group_2: Number of Members cannot be empty
text_alert_warning_group_3: The number of lecturers selected must be the same as the number of groups
text_alert_warning_group_4: The lecturers have been selected, are you sure? The selected data cannot be changed
text_alert_warning_group_5: Number of Regions selected at least 2 or more
text_alert_warning_group_6: Region has been selected, are you sure? The selected data cannot be changed
text_alert_warning_group_7: Make sure the data you enter is correct, Continue?
text_alert_warning_group_8: You will process group creation, Continue?
text_alert_warning_activity_1: Are you sure you want to delete this activity?
text_alert_warning_dashboard_1: Are you sure you want to validate this data?
text_alert_value: You can't see the value, please make a full payment
text_alert_upload: Are you sure you want to upload this file?
text_alert_list_group_1: Data has been selected, are you sure? The selected data cannot be changed
text_alert_deleted: Your selected data has been deleted successfully
text_alert_registration: Do not leave the page before successful registration
text_alert_registration_1: You will be directed to fill in your ID Number and full name, Continue?
text_alert_registration_2: You have successfully filled in the PBL registration data. Next, please make the payment process via the link that has been sent to your email.
